summary.position: ASSOCIATE SENIOR LECTURER (TENURE TRACK) in AI for SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
summary.research_focus: Using and developing (generative) AI to improve software development processes and quality of software artefacts.
responsibilities: Research, teaching, and supervision in software engineering.
Leading and developing the department's research and educational activities.
Conducting lectures and practical elements at undergraduate and graduate levels.
Supervision of degree and project work, and opportunity to supervise doctoral students.
summary.collaboration: Part of the strategic research area in IT and mobile communication, ELLIIT.

eligibility.qualifications: Completed a doctoral degree or has equivalent scientific competence.
eligibility.preference: Candidates awarded a doctoral degree or equivalent no more than five years prior to the application deadline.
eligibility.special_considerations: Consideration for earlier qualifications if significant reasons exist (e.g., illness, parental leave).
